basic_info.description: I'm Tiago Nunes.I pride myself in being a trustworthy, curious, hard-working and fast-learning autodidact. I'm a team player, but am also able to learn and work independently and achieve goals. I speak 4 languages and have years of international experience. I make up for inexperience with high motivation and drive. The main thing that characterizes me is a desire and passion to learn, get better and succeed. Iâ€™m looking forward to working together!

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Found this amazing portfolio layout by Dorota Gil on github and rewrote in Typescript with i-18-next to switch languages.

projects.title: Market Cilindros
projects.description: Fullstack project built on the module 3 of the Bootcamp of Cubos Academy, built the backend with NodeJS, express, bcrypt and jwt. The Frontend was React and Material-UI. Deployed the front on Netlify and the back on Heroku

projects.title: CuboFlix
projects.description: An app I build in order to iterate a Movie API, with a React frontend and also a layout of a possible cart.
